Title: Mrittika Maya
Writer: Gazi Rakayet (dialogue), Gazi Rakayet (screenplay), Gazi Rakayet (story)
Actors: Raisul Islam Asad, Titas Zia, Shormy Mala, Akhtaruzzaman
Plot: Khirmohon is an old man and a potter by profession. All his life, he has struggled to keep his head above water and now is the owner of his own pottery house and a banyan tree. His two sons...
